message.body: Hey you used to live in Boston correct
Yeah, while I was in grad school
What's the fun neighborhood called, where all the bars are? I know that's prob very vague lol
I'm thinking north end but not sure
North end has tons of good food, some bars. For booze I'd say Faneuil hall or Boylston. #### agrees - he used to live there too. :)
Awesome, thanks :-) thinking of going there for v-day wknd
Ha. Just prepare for frigid temps!
I think north end was my fave before cuz it reminded me of Europe
Yeah I know, used to it :-)
You should reach out to ### if you want restaurant recommendations. She ALWAYS knows what the best places to eat are and she and #### still live there
